title: Beautiful and Spacious 2 BR/2BA Condo for rent!
app_fee: $30 per renter. Application processing and background check
posting_body: Available August 2022, this pristine-condition remodeled 2 bedroom/2 bathroom condo is for rent!
Please see photos to get an idea of layout and quality of this condo!
Bright and sun-filled during the day
Stainless steel appliances and granite counter tops
Building amenities: Locked front entrance, well maintained and quiet (Small) building, locked courtyard, paid parking spot (if available).
Location is minutes away from Andersonville, Bryn Mawr redline train station, restaurants and shops.
Contact me today to set up an appointment!
Renter must fill out an application ($30 per renter) that includes back ground check.
1st month's rent as a deposit required.
